name: hamantasch
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a pastry in the shape of a triangle, filled with honey, poppy seeds, prunes (= dried plums), or jam, eaten at the Jewish holiday of Purim: I got a hamantasch and a piece of kugel. People give gifts of food, like a basket filled with sweet things, often Hamantaschen and things like that.
More examplesFewer examplesHamantaschen are one of the traditional sweets of the festive Jewish holiday of Purim.Triangular hamantaschen, filled with dried fruit, poppy seeds, or jam, are a traditional treat during Purim.
